languages.text: "Смеешь дерзить Вольному Торговцу? Твое тело уже покрыто множеством шрамов, но язык просит добавить новых".
"You dare insult the Rogue Trader with your impudence? Your body may already be covered in scars, but your tongue seems to be asking for more."
languages.original_text: "Смеешь дерзить Вольному Торговцу? Твое тело уже покрыто множеством шрамов, но язык просит добавить новых".

traits.locale_text: "You dare insult the Rogue Trader with your impudence? Your body is already covered in scars, but I see your tongue is asking for more."
"You dare insult the Rogue Trader with your impudence? Your body is already covered in scars, but I see your tongue is asking for more."

"You dare insult the Rogue Trader with your impudence? Your body may already be covered in scars, but your tongue seems to be asking for more."

languages.text: « Vous osez insulter {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, impudent ? Votre corps est déjà couvert de cicatrices, mais votre langue semble en réclamer davantage. »
languages.original_text: "You dare insult the Rogue Trader with your impudence? Your body may already be covered in scars, but your tongue seems to be asking for more."

traits.locale_text: « Vous osez insulter {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, impudent ? Votre corps est déjà couvert de cicatrices, mais votre langue semble en réclamer davantage. »

languages.text: «¿Osa insultar {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente con su insolencia? Tendrá el cuerpo lleno de cicatrices, pero su lengua está pidiendo más a gritos».
languages.original_text: "You dare insult the Rogue Trader with your impudence? Your body may already be covered in scars, but your tongue seems to be asking for more."

traits.locale_text: «¿Osa insultar {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente con su insolencia? Tendrá el cuerpo lleno de cicatrices, pero su lengua está pidiendo más a gritos».

languages.text: 「厚かましい態度でローグトレーダーを侮辱するのか？その体はすでに傷だらけだが、お前の舌はさらに傷を求めているようだな」
languages.original_text: "You dare insult the Rogue Trader with your impudence? Your body may already be covered in scars, but your tongue seems to be asking for more."

traits.locale_text: 「厚かましい態度でローグトレーダーを侮辱するのか？その体はすでに傷だらけだが、お前の舌はさらに傷を求めているようだな」

languages.text: “你竟敢以如此无礼的回答冒犯行商浪人？虽然你浑身上下都是伤，但在我看来，你的舌头打算让你再添几个。”
languages.original_text: "You dare insult the Rogue Trader with your impudence? Your body may already be covered in scars, but your tongue seems to be asking for more."

traits.locale_text: “你竟敢以如此无礼的回答冒犯行商浪人？虽然你浑身上下都是伤，但在我看来，你的舌头打算让你再添几个。”

languages.text: "Ihr wagt es, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} mit Eurer Unverschämtheit zu beleidigen? Euer Körper mag voller Narben sein, aber Eure Zunge scheint nach weiteren zu verlangen."
languages.original_text: "You dare insult the Rogue Trader with your impudence? Your body may already be covered in scars, but your tongue seems to be asking for more."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wagt es, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} mit Eurer Unverschämtheit zu beleidigen? Euer Körper mag voller Narben sein, aber Eure Zunge scheint nach weiteren zu verlangen."

languages.text: "Hür Tacir'i bu hadsizliğinle nasıl aşağılarsın? Bedenin yara izleriyle kaplı olabilir ama dilin daha doymamış gibi."
languages.original_text: "You dare insult the Rogue Trader with your impudence? Your body may already be covered in scars, but your tongue seems to be asking for more."
